See Site Map

MDM GUI @ https://{{env}}.reltio.com/ui/{{MDM Tentant ID}}
-top bar
  -tenant name
  -More menu
    -Create Profile
      -[Entity 1]
        -left side bar
          -Profile tab
            -main pane
              -top bar
                -drop down menu
                  -viewing
                  -editing
                  -delete
                -comment icon
                  -add comment
            -right side bar
              -Research tab
                -xxx:fill in
              -Network tab
                -xxx:fill in
              -History tab
                -xxx:fill in
              -Discussions tab
                -xxx:fill in
              -Workflows tab
                -xxx:fill in
            -Relationships tab (not all entities may show this on their profile page)
            -Graph tab
            -Potential Matches tab
            -Interactions tab
            -Sources tab
              -Legend tab (hover over crosswalks to see source of each attribute)
                -Crosswalk mode
                -Contributor mode
              -Ruleset tab
            -Activity Log tab
      -[Entity 2]
      -[Entity N]
  -Search tab
    -left side bar
      -Advanced
        -xxx:fill in
      -Entity Types filter (any entities here without records will be grayed out)
        -xxx:fill in
    -right pane
      -search top bar
        -Saved Searches
          -Saved Searches window
        -Search Results: Link icon
        -Search Results: Summary icon
        -Search Results: Summary & Detail icon
        -Search Results: Summary & Map icon
        -Search Results: Table icon
        -Search Results: Actions menu
          -Bulk operation
            -xxx:fill in
          -Export
            -CSV
            -JSON
  -Profile tab
    -left side bar
      -Profile tab
    -Potential Matches Facet (a default, but can be removed)
      -Profile Name link
      -Merge icon
      -Not a Match icon
      -See All... link
        -Shows potential matches side by side
          -main pain
            -first column - profile you came from
              -1st row
                -source icons
              -2nd row
                -Merge All link
              -3rd row 
                -Match Rules
              -4th row
                -profile details
            -second to nth column - to the right of the first
              -1st row
                -source icons
              -2nd row
                -Merge link
                  -Main pane changes to show a single column. Another source icon may be added. 
                -Not a Match link
              -3rd row 
                -Match Rules
              -4th row
                -profile details
  -Dashboard tab
    -right side bar
      -Activity Log
  -filter icon
  -vertical ellipses icon
  -grid icon
    -hub
    -console
    -RDM
    -Inbox
    -Reporting
  -circle icon

Console @ https://console.reltio.com/
-Configuration section
  -UI Modeler tile
    -left side bar
      -[Entity 1 Profile]
      -[Entity 2 Profile]
      -[Entity N Profile]
    -right side bar
      -Libraries tab
        -Views (aka Facets)
          -Hierarchy Tree
          -Hierarchy Path View
          -Attributes View
          -Single Attribute View
          -Image Attribute View
          -Relations View
          -Categories View
          -Workflow View
          -Potential Matches
      -Properties tab 
        -[properties of selected facet]
    -Publish button
      -Publish menu item (runs about 1 minute)
        -You need to manually refresh browser to see changes
      -Publish As menu item
  -Reltio IQ tile
  -Data Modeler tile
  -Workflow Modeler tile
-Tenant Management section
  -Tenant Management tile
  -Data Quality tile
  -Data Loader tile
  -Export tile
  -Health Status tile
-Security section
  -SSO Configuration tile
  -User Management tile
